definition: abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)

sentences.english: Small kingdom built huge walls aiming at protecting their territories.
sentences.chinese: 諸侯國修起城牆，藉以保護他們的領土。

sentences.english: THE hurricane seeks the shortest road by the no-road.
sentences.chinese: 颶風藉以無路索求最短的行程。

sentences.english: Through Elisha God's word was completely fulfilled.
sentences.chinese: 神藉以利沙所說的話完全應驗了。

sentences.english: He forgave his good-for-nothing brother for the purpose of maintaining brotherhood.
sentences.chinese: 他寬恕了他那不走正道的兄弟，藉以維持手足知情。

sentences.english: Stainless steel plates are fitted on the car walls in order to protect the car during freight transportation.
sentences.chinese: 客卡牆身裝有不鏽鋼板，藉以在運送貨物時保護客卡。

sentences.english: To keep the fruit of "shaking" it is necessary to have the support of blazing fire.
sentences.chinese: 爲了守住“搖”來地成果，必須藉以烈火。

sentences.english: Ignorance is the curse of God, knowledge the wing wherewith we fly to heaven.
sentences.chinese: 無知是罪惡，而知識則是我們藉以飛向天堂的翅膀。

sentences.english: The police put up b to control the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 警察設置障礙物，藉以控制人羣。

sentences.english: Knowledge the wing wherewith we fly to heaven.
sentences.chinese: 知識乃人類藉以飛向天堂的翅膀。

sentences.english: Hindus purify themselves by bathing in the river Ganges.
sentences.chinese: 印度教徒在恆河中浸泡藉以滌罪。

sentences.english: She eked out her small income by working as a music tutor.
sentences.chinese: 當音樂家庭教師，藉以彌補她那微薄收入的不足。

sentences.english: The company spread false information as a deception to mislead investors.
sentences.chinese: 公司散佈假信息，藉以製造假相，誤導投資者。

definition: in order that/so that/so as to/to cause sth
in order to/hoping to/attempting to/waiting for
to rely on/to depend on/by means of/thanks to/sth that one relies on/also written 憑借|凭借[ping2 jie4]
to establish schools/to raise the standard of education
variant of 並|并[bing4]/variant of 併|并[bing4]
